Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Transportation

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to guards along pedestrian walkways and in shopping center parking garages.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Guards along pedestrian walkways and in shopping center parking garages.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring fencing on pedestrian passageways elevated over vehicular or pedestrian right of ways.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring fencing on pedestrian passageways elevated over vehicular or pedestrian right of ways.
